TopicTitle: Titan Launch Systems, from BluPlanet Inc.

Articles.Content:
Our new employee, Startreader, has provided Titan 1 and 2 launch systems. These simple yet reliable medium lifters are good rockets for basic use. Do notice that due to packaging issues back at HQ, Titan 1 includes a staging error. It's no biggie, just merge the first stage with the second, and you'll be good to go. CREDIT: Startreader, rocket builder at BP Inc.

Downloads: https://www.dropbox.com/s/v68gl3dexlnkw5z/Titan%20launch%20systems.zip

Titan 1:

Titan 2:

Titan 3 is a medium-heavy lifter designed to carry payloads such as station parts into high kerbin or munar orbits:

Download:https://www.dropbox.com/s/y2n6w7t11c9anne/Titan%20III.craft

Enjoy!

Edited June 12, 2013 by Kerbol Prime
added Titan III
Lol, didn't notice that staging issue , don't worry, My new Super lifter atlas 1 Launch system shall has no Staging errors.
